definition: person representing the dead (during burial ceremonies)/to put a corpse on display (after execution)/variant of 屍|尸[shi1]/corpse

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to feel wronged/to cause sb to feel wronged/grievance
to surrender/to succumb/to yield/(as a transitive verb) to defeat/to prevail over
can be counted on one's fingers (idiom)/very few
to count as number one (idiom); second to none/outstanding
Qu Yuan (340-278 BC), famous Warring States statesman and poet, author of Sorrow at Parting 離騷|离骚 Lisao in Songs of Chu 楚辭|楚辞
to complain of an injustice/to lament sb's misfortune

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To evaluate the effects of sodium hyaluronate on adhesion prevention after flexor tendon surgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價透明質酸鈉預防術後屈肌腱粘連的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: It Be been to bad position forever, want all nest launch.
sentences.chinese: 永遠屈居於劣勢，想想都窩火呀。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo measure cortical areas involved ankle dorsiflexion and planter flexion.
sentences.chinese: 目的檢測參與踝關節背屈和跖屈運動的腦區。

sentences.english: Paretic in, enjoin limb knees hip flexor.
sentences.chinese: 患側在上，囑患肢屈膝屈髖。

sentences.english: Mrs. Tremaine announced their return to the Bantings.
sentences.chinese: 屈裏曼太太向班丁一家說明他們回來了。

sentences.english: Mrs Tremaine caught hold of the screen and swung it aside.
sentences.chinese: 屈裏曼太太抓住了屏風，把它甩到一邊去。

sentences.english: Sure enough, Tremaine lost his job.
sentences.chinese: 果然不出所料，屈裏曼丟了他的工作。

sentences.english: Cuverville Island was covered with gentoo penguins.
sentences.chinese: 屈維維爾島上住滿着巴布亞企鵝。

sentences.english: Tremaine unloaded his problems on to the Union.
sentences.chinese: 屈裏曼向工會訴說了他的困難問題。

sentences.english: Mrs. Tremaine lugged the mattress into a doorway.
sentences.chinese: 屈裏曼太太把墊褥拖到了一家大門口。

sentences.english: Another aspect of the invention is a method for treatment of flexor tendon injuries.
sentences.chinese: 本發明的另一個方面是一種治療屈肌腱損傷的方法。

sentences.english: Tremaine sank down with his face in his hands.
sentences.chinese: 屈裏曼兩手蒙着臉，一屁股坐了下去。

sentences.english: The forward simulation constitutes the basis of suppressing or utilizing peg-leg multiple wave.
sentences.chinese: 正演模擬是壓制或利用微屈多次波的基礎。

sentences.english: You wronged him when you said that he was dishonest.
sentences.chinese: 你說他不誠實是屈了他了。

sentences.english: To introduce the methods of treatment of rupture of flexor pollicis longus muscle tendon.
sentences.chinese: 介紹拇長屈肌腱斷裂的治療方法。

sentences.english: And certainly, whenever the wind blew, the Reed made the most graceful curtseys .
sentences.chinese: 這可不假，一旦起風，蘆葦便行起最優雅的屈。

definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
surname Kang/Kang, one of the 28 constellations
high mountain/highest peak of a mountain ridge
surname Zou/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1046-256 BC) in the southeast of Shandong Province
surname Pan/Pan, faun in Greek mythology, son of Hermes
first month of a season/eldest amongst brothers
surname Lou/one of the 28 lunar mansions in Chinese astronomy
